source.name: Mail Management Report - Federal Agency USPS Domestic Expenditures
source.description: Agencies annually report mail data using the Simplified Mail Accountability Reporting Tool (SMART), a web-based reporting tool cosponsored by GSA and the Department of Energy. The annual Mail Management Report publishes mail cost, professional certifications and the resulting data tables are available in these datasets. This dataset shows the Federal agency USPS domestic expenditures.
